product_name: Sugoi Turbo Tri Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built for race day performance, the Sugoi Turbo Tri shorts use lightweight, breathable fabric for a supportive, comfortable fit that lets you focus on the stage at hand. Polyester and spandex blend provides refined flexibility and moisture-wicking comfort in a soft, textured fabric. TRILite chamois combines padded comfort with a quick-drying surface and a run-friendly profile. Flatlock stitching and elastic grippers at the hems; reflective details on each leg increase visibility in low light. Interior key pocket stashes small extras. 6-panel construction creates a contoured fit. Closeout.
